text: I tried to uninstall the old version but got this. I tried to “npm init” first and then the unistallation but i just got this error?

Hi guys, I have quick question, hopefully someone would know :smile:

I am trying to fetch a Module from my sandbox to my local machine, but the *fields* are not importet. I do manage to import all the files (fields.json, meta.json, module.css, module.html, module.js), but the fields.json isn’t updated with the new fields I created on the Design Tool gui.

I am using this command: `hs fetch /` 

Thank you very much for your help!
use `sudo` before the command.  will ask you for a password
Hi folks! I'm wondering if its possible to retrieve marketing ad campaign data via the HubSpot api. Something like `impressions`, `clicks`, `cost per contact`, etc...
